content: Wood fine finish miter saw blade Ultimate wood fine finish miter saw blade (12” | 305mm) with carbide teeth, for precise and clean cuts in wooden beams with our SM 60-22 cordless miter saw ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Our highest finishing quality – pair our fine finish miter saw blade with our cordless miter saw for virtually splinter free finishes Increased tooth count – 60 carbide teeth make the blade glide more easily through wood for smoother cuts and longer blade lifetime Cutting-edge tooth design – alternate top bevel with raker (ATBR) tooth sequencing adds cutting stability and helps clean out and eject chips for cleaner cuts Battery optimized – blade body and teeth are designed to be extremely efficient and get the best performance out of our cordless miter saw Applications Bevel and miter cuts for case work, mill work and interior woodwork such as cabinets, molding and trim Commercial wood framing, especially precise, serial cuts in beams, structural elements and temporary supports Rip, cross, bevel and miter cuts with significantly reduced splintering and tear-out ### TECHNICAL DATA: Blade diameter: 12 in Number of teeth: 60 Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2415105 - Circ. saw blade SCBW FF SPX 12 A - Package Size 1 pc
